products.name: Basics To Advanced In React
products.overview: Learn React from scratch to advanced topics with real-world projects.
products.long_description: This course covers everything from JSX basics, state management, hooks, routing, context API, to performance optimization and deployment.

products.name: Mastering JavaScript
products.overview: Complete guide to JavaScript ES6+ features.
products.long_description: Covers all core concepts, advanced patterns, and modern best practices for building scalable web apps.

products.name: CSS Masterclass
products.overview: Learn advanced CSS layouts, animations, and responsive design.
products.long_description: Includes Flexbox, Grid, responsive media queries, transitions, transforms, and UI animations.

products.name: Node.js Backend Development
products.overview: Learn to build REST APIs using Node.js and Express.
products.long_description: Includes authentication, database integration, and deployment on cloud platforms.

products.name: Python For Beginners
products.overview: Start your programming journey with Python.
products.long_description: Covers syntax, functions, data structures, and small automation projects.

products.name: Full Stack MERN Bootcamp
products.overview: Learn MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.
products.long_description: Hands-on projects building complete applications from scratch.

products.name: Tailwind CSS In Depth
products.overview: Learn to build modern, responsive UIs with Tailwind.
products.long_description: From setup to advanced utility-first design techniques.

products.name: TypeScript Crash Course
products.long_description: Covers interfaces, generics, type assertions, and working with APIs.

products.name: React Native Mobile Apps
products.overview: Build mobile apps for iOS and Android.
products.long_description: Complete guide with hands-on projects and API integration.

products.name: Django Web Development
products.overview: Python-based web framework for full-stack apps.
products.long_description: Includes database models, authentication, and deployment.

products.name: SQL Mastery
products.long_description: Covers MySQL, PostgreSQL, and advanced query performance tuning.

products.name: Git & GitHub Essentials
products.long_description: Covers branching, merging, pull requests, and collaboration workflows.

products.name: Next.js Zero to Hero
products.long_description: Learn SSR, ISR, API routes, and SEO optimization.

products.name: Vue.js From Scratch
products.overview: Progressive JavaScript framework for building UIs.
products.long_description: Includes Vue CLI, Vue Router, Vuex, and composition API.

products.name: Angular Complete Guide
products.long_description: Covers components, services, RxJS, forms, and deployment.
